value.title: Introduction to data modeling in Power BI
value.excerpt: In today's video we will go through the basics of data modeling in Power BI, to get you started fast and easy! value.title: List dates between two dates in Power Query
value.excerpt: Need to create a list of dates between a start date and end date? Well, let's look at how Imke did it in the Power BI community, it will blow your mind :) #curbal #powerquery #mlanguage #powerbi  Here is the thread on the Power BI community, where you can find Imke's code: https://community.powerbi.com/t5/Desktop/M-Power-Query-help-for-table-merge-Conditional-Cross-Join/m-p/478272#M222561

value.title: Power BI vs Excel: When you should use each tool
value.excerpt: Which tool is best? Power BI or Excel?  Well, it depends on what you are trying to do. Both tools have unique strengths and limitations and in this video I will try to show both.  Hopefully after watching this video, you will have a better understanding of both tools and will know when to use which depending
